description.value: An extension to replicate the changes within R5 to identify a parameter name and value for information passed to the channel for notifications. In this context, the element is used to identify the headers related to API versions. E.g, Header1 or Header2

purpose.value: This extension is a Multicast Network Service (MNS) use case, require to indicate to identify the headers related to API versions.(E.g, Header1 or Header2).
